metadata.title: CVE-2021-0935 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In ip6_xmit of ip6_output.c, there is a possible out of bounds write due toa use after free. This could lead to local escalation of privilege withSystem execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID:A-168607263References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').

linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.4.0-1073.79').
